trans-unit.source: Contains a sequential list of role groups that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginView" /> control uses to determine which control template to display to users based on their role.
trans-unit.target: 包含角色群組的循序清單，而 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginView" /> 控制項是根據使用者的角色來決定要顯示的控制項樣板。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection> class manages the list of role groups associated with a particular <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginView> template.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection>類別會管理角色相關聯的群組與特定清單<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginView>範本。

trans-unit.source: Each role group defines the content and controls to display to a particular group of users on your Web site.
trans-unit.target: 每個角色的群組定義的內容和控制項來顯示特定的網站上的使用者群組。

trans-unit.source: It is possible to assign several role groups to the same template.
trans-unit.target: 您可將數個角色群組指派給相同的範本。

trans-unit.source: To find the role group in the collection that a particular user belongs to, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection.GetMatchingRoleGroup%2A> method to search the collection by user name.
trans-unit.target: 若要尋找特定的使用者所屬的集合中的角色群組，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection.GetMatchingRoleGroup%2A>要依使用者名稱搜尋集合的方法。

trans-unit.source: The order of the roles in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection> collection is important because matching is done sequentially based on the first role found.
trans-unit.target: 角色中的順序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection>集合很重要，因為比對由依序根據找到的第一個角色。

trans-unit.source: You must configure role management to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection> class to manage a list of role groups.
trans-unit.target: 您必須設定要使用的角色管理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection>類別以管理角色群組的清單。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Understanding Role Management](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a0d2f19d-a2a7-496d-88b6-30133f8ea3d6).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[了解角色管理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a0d2f19d-a2a7-496d-88b6-30133f8ea3d6)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup" /> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至集合的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds a role group to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將角色群組加入集合的結尾。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a dynamically created <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將動態建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection>。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup" /> to look for in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要在集合中搜尋的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup" />。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the collection contains the specified role group.
trans-unit.target: 指出集合是否包含指定的角色群組。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified role group is a member of the collection; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的使用者是集合的成員，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based array of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup" /> objects that receives the items copied from the collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup" /> 物件之以零起始的陣列，接收複製自集合之項目。

trans-unit.source: The position in the target array at which the array starts receiving the copied items.
trans-unit.target: 目標陣列中開始接收複製項目的位置。

trans-unit.source: Copies all the items from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection" /> collection to a compatible one-dimensional array of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup" /> objects, starting at the specified index in the target array.
trans-unit.target: 從目標陣列的指定索引開始，複製 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection" /> 集合的所有項目至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup" /> 物件的相容一維陣列。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection.CopyTo%2A> method to copy the contents of the collection into the specified zero-based array.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection.CopyTo%2A>方法，將集合的內容複製到指定以零為起始的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Items are copied starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: 目標陣列的指定索引處開始複製的項目。

trans-unit.source: After the items are in an array, you can use array syntax to access the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 位於陣列的項目之後，您可以使用陣列語法來存取中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection>集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal" /> that represents the user account to find the role group collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal" /> 表示使用者帳戶，以尋找角色群組集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first role group that contains the specified user account.
trans-unit.target: 回傳第一個包含指定之使用者帳戶的角色群組。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup" /> representing the first role group in the collection that contains the specified user account.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup" /> 表示包含指定使用者帳戶之集合中的第一個角色群組。

trans-unit.source: If the user is not part of a role group in the collection, it returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者不是集合中使用者群組的一部分，會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection.GetMatchingRoleGroup%2A> method searches the role group collection and returns the first role group that contains the specified user account.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection.GetMatchingRoleGroup%2A>方法搜尋角色群組集合，並傳回第一個角色群組，其中包含指定的使用者帳戶。

trans-unit.source: The method searches the collection in the order role groups are added to the collection, and returns only the first matching role group.
trans-unit.target: 方法會在集合中搜尋群組加入至集合中，順序角色中，並傳回只有第一個符合角色群組。

trans-unit.source: If the specified user account is not part of any of the role groups in the collection, `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的使用者帳戶不屬於任何角色中的群組集合中，`null`傳回。

trans-unit.source: You must configure role management to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection.GetMatchingRoleGroup%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您必須設定要使用的角色管理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection.GetMatchingRoleGroup%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Understanding Role Management](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a0d2f19d-a2a7-496d-88b6-30133f8ea3d6).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[了解角色管理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a0d2f19d-a2a7-496d-88b6-30133f8ea3d6)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="user" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="user" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup" /> to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要在集合中尋找的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup" />。

trans-unit.source: Searches the collection and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence of the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋集合，並傳回指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup" /> 中第一個符合以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of <paramref name="group" /> within the entire <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection" />, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 整個 <paramref name="group" /> 中第一個出現 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection" /> 之以零為起始的索引 (如有找到)，否則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection.IndexOf%2A> method performs a linear search; therefore the average execution time depends on the number of members in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法執行的線性搜尋; 因此，平均執行時間取決於集合中的成員數目。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to insert the role group.
trans-unit.target: 要插入角色群組之以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The role group to insert.
trans-unit.target: 要插入的角色群組。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup" /> to the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup" /> 加入指定索引的集合中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection.Insert%2A> method inserts the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup> at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection.Insert%2A>方法插入指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup>在指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: Role groups that follow the insertion point move down in the collection to accommodate the new element.
trans-unit.target: 角色群組，後面接著插入點會在集合中向下移動，以容納新項目。

trans-unit.source: The index of the role group to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回之角色群組的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the role group at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定索引中的角色群組。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 指定索引處的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup" /> to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要從集合中移除的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup" />。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the first occurrence of the specified role group from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合中刪除指定角色群組的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: The first instance of the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup> object is removed from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 指定的第一個執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup>物件移除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection>集合。

trans-unit.source: Groups that follow the removed group all move up in the index to fill the vacated spot.
trans-unit.target: 請遵循在移除的群組會在索引中向上移動，以填滿空出的位置。

trans-unit.source: If there is more than one instance of the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup> object, only the first instance is removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有指定的多個執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup>物件時，會移除第一個執行個體。
